result.reason: Implement support for self-signed certificates within Chromium (WebView2) rendering to enhance compatibility with various environments.
result.approach: Modify the CoreWebView2 initialization to include custom handling for certificate errors, likely by subscribing to a relevant event or configuring the environment to trust self-signed certificates.
